sense.def: Pathological Condition of spasms disease affecting women during pregnancy. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 42: 妊娠而發 者，悶冒不識人，須臾醒，醒復發，亦是風傷太陽之經作痙也，亦名子 癇 , “When it breaks out during pregnancy, [patients] experience heart-pressure and do not recognize others. After a short while they regain consciousness. Oncethey have regained consciousness another outbreak follows. This is a spasms [disease] brought forth by wind harming the major yang conduit. Another name is infant’s epilepsy ”.
